00001 #ifndef VECTOR3D_HPP_
00002 #define VECTOR3D_HPP_
00003 
00004 #include "math.hpp"
00005 #include "vector2d.hpp"
00006 
00007 namespace math {
00008 
00009 class vector3d : public VECTOR3F, public MathSubsystem
00010 {
00011 public:
00012         using VECTOR3F::x;
00013         using VECTOR3F::y;
00014         using VECTOR3F::z;
00015 
00016         inline
00017         vector3d() {
00018                 x=0.0f;
00019                 y=0.0f;
00020                 z=0.0f;
00021         }
00022 
00023         inline explicit
00024         vector3d(const float xx, const float yy, const float zz) {
00025                 x = xx;
00026                 y = yy;
00027                 z = zz;
00028         }
00029 
00030         inline explicit
00031         vector3d(const vector2d& v, float zz) {
00032                 x = v.x;
00033                 y = v.y;
00034                 z = zz;
00035         }
00036 
00037         inline explicit
00038         vector3d(const vector3d* v) {
00039                 x = v->x;
00040                 y = v->y;
00041                 z = v->z;
00042         }
00043 
00044         inline
00045         vector3d(const vector3d& v) {
00046                 x = v.x;
00047                 y = v.y;
00048                 z = v.z;
00049         }
00050 
00051         inline
00052         operator float*()
00053         {
00054                 return &x;
00055         }
00056 
00057         inline
00058         operator const float*() const
00059         {
00060                 return &x;
00061         }
00062 
00063         inline
00064         float& operator[](const int index) {
00065                 return *(&x + index);
00066         }
00067 
00068         inline
00069         vector3d operator+() {
00070                 return *this;
00071         }
00072 
00073         inline
00074         vector3d operator-() {
00075                 return vector3d(-x, -y, -z);
00076         }
00077 
00078         inline
00079         vector3d& operator=(const vector3d& v) {
00080                 x = v.x;
00081                 y = v.y;
00082                 z = v.z;
00083                 return *this;
00084         }
00085 
00086         inline
00087         vector3d& operator+=(const vector3d& v) {
00088                 x += v.x;
00089                 y += v.y;
00090                 z += v.z;
00091                 return *this;
00092         }
00093 
00094         inline
00095         vector3d& operator-=(const vector3d& v) {
00096                 x -= v.x;
00097                 y -= v.y;
00098                 z -= v.z;
00099                 return *this;
00100         }
00101 
00102         inline
00103         vector3d& operator*=(const vector3d& v) {
00104                 return *this = vector3d((y * v.z)-(z * v.y),
00105                                 (z * v.x)-(x * v.z),
00106                                 (x * v.y)-(y * v.x));
00107         }
00108 
00109         inline
00110         vector3d& operator*=(const float scalar) {
00111                 x *= scalar;
00112                 y *= scalar;
00113                 z *= scalar;
00114                 return *this;
00115         }
00116 
00117         inline
00118         vector3d& operator/=(const float scalar) {
00119                 x /= scalar;
00120                 y /= scalar;
00121                 z /= scalar;
00122                 return *this;
00123         }
00124 
00125         inline
00126         bool operator==(const vector3d& v) {
00127                 return (x == v.x)&&(y == v.y)&&(z == v.z);
00128         }
00129 
00130         inline
00131         bool operator!=(const vector3d& v) {
00132                 return (x != v.x)||(y != v.y)||(z != v.z);
00133         }
00134 
00135         inline
00136         bool operator||(const vector3d& v) {
00137                 return ((x * v.y * v.z)==(v.x * y * v.z))==(v.x * v.y * z);
00138         }
00139 
00140         inline friend
00141         vector3d operator+(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00142                 return vector3d(v1.x + v2.x, v1.y + v2.y, v1.z + v2.z);
00143         }
00144 
00145         inline friend
00146         vector3d operator-(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00147                 return vector3d(v1.x - v2.x, v1.y - v2.y, v1.z - v2.z);
00148         }
00149 
00150         inline friend
00151         vector3d operator*(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00152                 return vector3d((v1.y * v2.z)-(v1.z * v2.y),
00153                                 (v1.z * v2.x)-(v1.x * v2.z),
00154                                 (v1.x * v2.y)-(v1.y * v2.x));
00155         }
00156 
00157         inline friend
00158         vector3d operator*(const vector3d& v, const float scalar) {
00159                 return vector3d(v.x * scalar, v.y * scalar, v.z * scalar);
00160         }
00161 
00162         inline friend
00163         vector3d operator*(const float scalar,const vector3d& v) {
00164                 return vector3d(v.x * scalar, v.y * scalar, v.z * scalar);
00165         }
00166 
00167         inline friend
00168         vector3d operator/(const vector3d& v, const float scalar) {
00169                 return vector3d(v.x / scalar, v.y / scalar, v.z / scalar);
00170         }
00171 
00172         inline friend
00173         float operator,(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00174                 return (v1.x * v2.x)+(v1.y * v2.y)+(v1.z * v2.z);
00175         }
00176 
00177         inline friend
00178         float abs(const vector3d& v) {
00179                 return sqrt((v.x * v.x)+(v.y * v.y)+(v.z * v.z));
00180         }
00181 
00182         inline friend
00183         float abs_sq(const vector3d& v) {
00184                 return (v.x * v.x)+(v.y * v.y)+(v.z * v.z);
00185         }
00186 
00187         inline friend
00188         float distance(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00189                 return sqrt((v1.x - v2.x)*(v1.x - v2.x)
00190                                 +(v1.y - v2.y)*(v1.y - v2.y)
00191                                 +(v1.z - v2.z)*(v1.z - v2.z));
00192         }
00193 
00194         inline friend
00195         float distance_sq(const vector3d& v1, const vector3d& v2) {
00196                 return (v1.x - v2.x)*(v1.x - v2.x)
00197                 +(v1.y - v2.y)*(v1.y - v2.y)
00198                 +(v1.z - v2.z)*(v1.z - v2.z);
00199         }
00200 
00201         inline friend
00202         vector3d& max(vector3d& v1, vector3d& v2) {
00203                 return abs_sq(v1) > abs_sq(v2) ? v1 : v2;
00204         }
00205 
00206         inline friend
00207         vector3d& min(vector3d& v1, vector3d& v2) {
00208                 return abs_sq(v1) < abs_sq(v2) ? v1 : v2;
00209         }
00210 
00211         inline friend
00212         vector3d normalized(const vector3d& v) {
00213                 return vector3d(v/abs(v));
00214         }
00215 
00216         inline
00217         vector3d& normalize() {
00218                 return *this/=abs(*this);
00219         }
00220 
00221 #ifdef MATH_DEBUG
00222 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, vector3d& v) {
00223         return os<<"x: "<<v.x<<" y: "<<v.y<<" z: "<<v.z<<'\n';
00224 }
00225 #endif
00226 };
